Text.val: 17.04.2014 JH SCR18832 BXA009G Changed description in PaidAmount and PaymentDifference
13.01.2014 SH SCR16662 BXA009D Removed CR/LF between <data><![CDATA[ and first output string
23.12.2013 GB SCR18595 BXA009H: Chnaged value of V.SUBJECT
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
... set trigger to delete TX09 row in calling program if letter is redirected to LPD
... LinkQuery on REPA is recomputed if a new REPA row is added iin BXA009A
-- Set report language to client/debtor language
... if PAYD_JOURNALNO > 0 the letter is already created, BXA009 is called to
... fetch user details for further use in BXA009
-- build filenames for temporary XML Files
... set currency for BXA910 = admin currency to avoid starting BXA910 without
currency, only if not set in pervious part where the outstanding invoices are written to XML
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- allow deletion of the temporary record in calling program BXACALL
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523
... LinkQuery on REPA is recomputed if a new REPA row is added, to achieve that the
locate variable PAYD_REPA_JOURNALNO is updated via parameter
-- Retreive email address of payent department
... if not exists, retreive email address of incasso department
.. if email address is still empty use email from debtor
-- Set other BXA900 parameters if an email address is determined

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRPAY) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BPIV where BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 and :4 and (BPIV_PAYMENTCODE = :5 or BPIV_PAYMENTCODE = :6) and BPIV_PAYMENTCODE > 0 for fetch only
SELECT INVO_DEBC_NO, INVO_INVOICENO, INVO_INVDATE, INVO_DUEDATE, INVO_CURRENCY, INVO_AACTUALI FROM :1/INVO WHERE INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 :3 ORDER BY INVO_DEBC_NO, INVO_INVOICENO FOR FETCH ONLY
SELECT INVO_CURRENCY, CAST(SUM(INVO_AACTUALI) AS DECIMAL(18,2)) FROM :1/INVO WHERE INVO_DEBC_NO=:2 :3 GROUP BY INVO_CURRENCY FOR FETCH ONLY

MERGE_PARM.PIC_U: U4 U4 U4 U4 U4 U4 U4 U4 U2

Text.val: -- Calculate totals to print to XML at the end when all invoices are written
-- first a blank segment has to be written to XML

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Amount still to pay or to be deducted')
